item.title: Cryptopals Challenges - Set 1
item.description: Solutions to Set 1 of the CryptoPals challenges.

item.title: About
item.description:
Hi all, I’m a software engineer currently working on FinTech and stablecoin infrastructure at Figure Technologies. I joined the company when it was one year old, and helped it scale to a successful IPO in September 2025. Before that I worked for Blackmore Sensors and Analytics (now part of Aurora), and Los Alamos National Laboratory.

I hold a Bachelor’s degree in Mechanical Engineering from Montana State University and a Master’s degree in Computer Science from Montana State University. During my studies, I developed a strong interest in algorithms, programming languages, simulation, machine learning, and cryptography. I completed my Master’s thesis on convolutional neural networks and hyperspectral imagery. I continue to develop these interests through side projects, including implementations of encrypted chat over a decentralized bluetooth mesh and work on challenges like CryptoPals.
